evidence.claim: Spright employs AWS for cloud services including Lambda and S3 for scalable application hosting and storage.
The company aligns its operations with HIPAA regulations to ensure secure health data handling.
Spright's use of HL7 FHIR standards facilitates interoperability in healthcare data exchange.
Integration patterns leveraging microservices are outlined on their engineering page to enhance workflow efficiency.
X12 transaction sets are supported to streamline medical billing and insurance claims processes.

icp.icp_reason: Spright utilizes X12 for health tech, aligning with API-first healthcare needs.
